content:
> **what do you guys think is restricting us from being SR?**

nothing, really. presently appearing thoughts can reference the past and future, but neither could actually restrict whatever you're presently being, because they aren't being present by definition.

if it was thought that SR was somewhere in the future or from a past, it could appear as a restriction on you since you're never being inside of a past or future, but that would be an illusion which you quite literally aren't ever being.
